lyrics.ChnStr: 我怕我沒有機會‧跟你說一聲再見
lyrics.Pinyin: 我[wǒ]怕[pà]我[wǒ]沒[méi]有[yǒu]機[jī]會[huì]‧跟[gēn]你[nǐ]說[shuō]一[yī]聲[shēng]再[zài]見[jiàn]
lyrics.EngStr: I'm afraid I won't have the chance to say goodbye to you

lyrics.ChnStr: 因為也許就再也見不到你
lyrics.Pinyin: 因[yīn]為[wéi]也[yě]許[xū]就[jiù]再[zài]也[yě]見[jiàn]不[bù]到[dào]你[nǐ]
lyrics.EngStr: Because maybe I'll never see you again

lyrics.ChnStr: 明天我要離開‧熟悉的地方和你
lyrics.Pinyin: 明[míng]天[tiān]我[wǒ]要[yào]離[lí]開[kāi]‧熟[shú]悉[xī]的[de]地[dì]方[fāng]和[hé]你[nǐ]
lyrics.EngStr: Tomorrow I will leave, the familiar place and you

lyrics.ChnStr: 要分離‧我眼淚就掉下去
lyrics.Pinyin: 要[yào]分[fēn]離[lí]‧我[wǒ]眼[yǎn]淚[lèi]就[jiù]掉[diào]下[xià]去[qù]
lyrics.EngStr: We have to part, and my tears fall down

lyrics.ChnStr: 我會牢牢記住你的臉‧我會珍惜你給的思念
lyrics.Pinyin: 我[wǒ]會[huì]牢[láo]牢[láo]記[jì]住[zhù]你[nǐ]的[de]臉[liǎn]‧我[wǒ]會[huì]珍[zhēn]惜[xī]你[nǐ]給[gěi]的[de]思[sī]念[niàn]
lyrics.EngStr: I will tightly remember your face, I will cherish the longing you gave me

lyrics.ChnStr: 這些日子在我心中‧永遠都不會抹去
lyrics.Pinyin: 這[zhè]些[xiē]日[rì]子[zǐ]在[zài]我[wǒ]心[xīn]中[zhōng]‧永[yǒng]遠[yuǎn]都[dū]不[bù]會[huì]抹[mǒ]去[qù]
lyrics.EngStr: These days will forever remain in my heart, never to be erased

lyrics.ChnStr: 我不能答應你‧我是否會再回來
lyrics.Pinyin: 我[wǒ]不[bù]能[néng]答[dá]應[yīng]你[nǐ]‧我[wǒ]是[shì]否[fǒu]會[huì]再[zài]回[huí]來[lái]
lyrics.EngStr: I can't promise you whether I will return again

lyrics.ChnStr: 不回頭‧不回頭的走下去
lyrics.Pinyin: 不[bù]回[huí]頭[tóu]‧不[bù]回[huí]頭[tóu]的[de]走[zǒu]下[xià]去[qù]
lyrics.EngStr: I won't look back, I will keep walking forward

lyrics.ChnStr: 我怕我沒有機會 跟你說一聲再見
